content: I created the meeting agenda for today's meeting at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PE/2020-04-30+Patient+Empowerment+Agenda, to make it clear that there is a chance to participate, although the meeting is postponed by an hour from the regular time.
is the meeting today approx 2 hours from now?
ah then this does not overlap my other appointment and I can finally join!
I'm hoping @Virginia Lorenzi is able to open the call for us.
I won't be able to attend today -- I have a conflicting meeting at my "day job".
@John Keyes OK. Are you interested in the Connectathon? Any specific track? Anything we should get clarified?
I'm going to read through your notes -- thanks for putting them together. As a side note, I'm not actually an HL7 member, so I probably cannot participate in the Connectathon.
You can totally participate - HL7 membership is not required
As a general note, anyone is able to participate in anything HL7 does except formal votes.
The registration for the connectathon costs $50 more if you're not a member, that's the only difference.
